statements: SELECT id, user_id, biometric_type, biometric_data FROM biometric_data
SELECT user_id, id, biometric_data, biometric_type FROM biometric_data
SELECT biometric_type, biometric_data, id, user_id FROM biometric_data
SELECT * FROM biometric_data
SELECT id, biometric_type FROM biometric_data
SELECT id, user_id, biometric_type, biometric_data FROM biometric_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY biometric_type DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM biometric_data GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT biometric_type, AVG(LENGTH(biometric_data)) AS avg_length FROM biometric_data GROUP BY biometric_type;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint';
SELECT * FROM BiometricData WHERE ID = 1
SELECT User_ID, Biometric_Type FROM BiometricData ORDER BY Biometric_Type DESC
SELECT * FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE Amount > 1000 ORDER BY Transaction_Date ASC
SELECT Transaction_ID, User_ID, Transaction_Date FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE Anomaly_Detected = TRUE
SELECT * FROM BiometricData INNER JOIN PaymentTransactions ON BiometricData.User_ID = PaymentTransactions.User_ID
SELECT User_ID, Biometric_Type FROM BiometricData WHERE ID = 1;
SELECT Biometric_Data FROM BiometricData WHERE Biometric_Type = 'Fingerprint' ORDER BY ID DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE Amount > 1000;
SELECT Transaction_ID, Transaction_Date FROM PaymentTransactions WHERE Anomaly_Detected = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM BiometricData, PaymentTransactions WHERE BiometricData.User_ID = PaymentTransactions.User_ID;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data;
SELECT user_id, retina_data, heart_rate_data FROM biometric_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM anomaly_detection WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_status = 'successful';
SELECT user_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100 AND transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE heart_rate_data > 70;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type FROM anomaly_detection WHERE detection_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type, anomaly_description FROM anomaly_detection WHERE user_id = 3 AND anomaly_type = 'irregularity'
SELECT * FROM biometric_data;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, detected_at FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type = 'fraud' ORDER BY detected_at;
SELECT transaction_id, security_level, security_status FROM payment_security WHERE security_status = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, transaction_id, security_level FROM transaction_data JOIN payment_security ON transaction_data.transaction_id = payment_security.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_data WHERE transaction_amount > 100;
SELECT transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transaction_data WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM transaction_date) = 9 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data, face_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, anomaly_type, detection_date FROM anomalies WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action, log_date FROM security_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE bio_auth_enabled = true;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data, face_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM payment_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS occurrences FROM anomalies GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, action, log_date FROM security_logs WHERE action LIKE '%login%';
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profile WHERE bio_auth_enabled = TRUE;
